name: Bobaland
description:
Bobaland is a desert known for its iconic bubble tea, giving those who drink it the power to defeat evil. You were sent to Bobaland to deal with their plugbie infestation. The plugbie is a monster shaped like an electric plug with two dangerous abilities: absorbing the health points of any living thing it touches and regenerating multiple versions of itself upon defeat.  Can you defeat the plugbie using the powers of Bobaland's iconic bubble tea, or will the plugbie completely take over Bobaland?

Third-Party Assets Used Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com

Third Person Character Controller Starter Assets - Unity

Feelings (Background Music) - Archip

Human Character 3D Model - Mixamo
